name: Alex Kroven: The mage detective
description:
NOTE: This VN game requires the M5Paper and a SD card.

NOTE2: This is not a complete story (it will be rewritten) and the game mechanics will be expanded later.

Installation

Use the Arduino IDE to install the engine on the M5Paper, copy the contents of the M5VN folder into the SD card.

Credits

Characters Art: YuukiPudding

Various Misc items: Konett

Backgrounds & UI elements : ayaemo
